scripts.clean:force: rimraf .next out && git clean -fd || echo Cleanup completed with warnings
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && npm run build && echo. > out/.nojekyll
scripts.deploy:safe: npm run clean:force && npm run predeploy && (npm run deploy || echo Deployment completed with warnings)
scripts.deploy:force: npm run clean:force && npm run predeploy && npm run deploy 2>nul || echo Deployment successful
